senses.sense_definition: Resembling a honeycomb; having a surface covered with small holes or depressions.

examples.text: The geologist examined the <w>favose</w> rock sample under a magnifying glass.
This <w>favose</w> surface allows the organism to trap small particles of food.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to or characteristic of the skin disease favus.

examples.text: The doctor prescribed an ointment to treat the <w>favose</w> eruption on the scalp.
Medical students studied the <w>favose</w> crusts to understand the progression of the infection.
